name: Cherry & Berry
description:
You are now in an arcade.

You only have 4 tokens left.

Can you win more?

In Cherry & Berry, every turn you have a 50% chance of winning more tokens. But you also have a 50% chance of losing the tokens you inserted. Inserting more tokens may give you a better reward, but it also increases your risk of losing it all. Cash out when you feel like you have won enough to continue playing other games in the arcade!

Inspired by my favorite arcade game Apples and Bananas from Tom's World back in the Philippines.

Made by GJ The Game Dev. A submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.
